content.raw: I think they ought to remain separate things, at least for the moment, since I can't think of a way to unify them without the drawbacks you mention. The terminal will display all logging messages, not just errors, whereas the top popup box will only display errors that were returned to the parent process, as well as errors in the parent process itself. For normal devices the terminal is debugging output that won't be visible most of the time, and won't pop up unless called upon, so there is not always visible duplication at least.
